title: Her Back-Up Bodyguard
description: When Eve's Uncle and part-time bodyguard is shot, Matt is sent in to protect her. Their attraction is instant and white-hot. But with Eve's life is at risk can they pursue a relationship?When Eve comes face to face with her worst nightmare, can Matt get to her in time to save her life?This is a short, insta-love romance with a happily-ever-after.
author: Nell Alexander
